name: VIR-237.01 Verify that the chief shopper is able to view the orders created by others within their organization

userStory.narrative:
As a chief shopper, I require the ability
to view the orders that anyone in my organization
placed within my order history so I can view all purchase history.

title: VIR-237.01 Verify that the chief shopper is able to view the orders created by others within their organization
